price: ទ្រង់មហាបរិសុទ្ធ និងខ្ពង់ខ្ពស់បំផុតអំពីអ្វីដែលពួកគេ (ពួកមូស្ហរីគីន)និយាយទៅទៀត។
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yaqūlūna ʿuluwwan kabīran
